'''13w23b''' is the twelfth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 7, 2013<ref>{{tweet|dinner|343169815063699456|Incidentally there's been a 13w23b for a while and golden apples were fixed (among other things)|07 Jun 13}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w23a]] snapshot.

13w23b was reuploaded half an hour after release.{{more info}}

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Golden apple]]s'''
* Now give the new [[Health Boost]] effect.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Status effect]]s'''
* Added [[Health Boost]] effect.
** Also, both the attribute and the potion effect now show the hearts.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Golden apple]]s'''
* Normal golden apples now give Regeneration II for 10 seconds.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Zombie]]s'''
* New mechanics and AI.
* Able to lock onto the player from much further away.
* Mobbing zombies can now move when further than 32 blocks from the player.
* Spawn additional zombies when not being looked at.

== Trivia ==
* This is the last version in which texture packs existed.
